ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are thankful to Diego Alvarez for his help during lentiviral transduction sessions and for providing ZIKV infected patients sera. The work described in this article was performed with financial support from Agencia Nacional de Promoción Científica y Tecnológica (ANPCyT) [PICT 2016-4813]. AC and DSC are members of the Research Career of CONICET.
